description:
Ever since the Age of the Gods, whenever evil draws near, a Saint will appear. Wielding the arms called a Cross, they battle to protect the goddess Athena who watches over the Earth. Amongst their number was the Bronze Pegasus Saint Seiya and his compatriots whose battles are legendary.
Since then, much time has passed. Now, the revival of Mars, the god of war, draws near, and it is time for a new Saint to step into the breach!
~ adapted and translated from official site by Cranston
Note: The first episode received an early screening at the Seiya Night event which took place at Shinjuku`s Wald 9 film theatre on Sat., March 31, 2012 from midnight to 6 am. A live screening of the event took place at Umeda`s Burg 7 and 109 Cinemas in Nagoya as well as several overseas theatres, UCI Jardim Sul in Sao Paulo, Brazil, CGR Cinema in Torcy, France and Viewshows Cinemas in Taipei, Taiwan. Regular broadcast of the show started on April 1, 2012.

REGULAR.description: Athena Saori watches over peace on Earth from Sanctuary and over young Kouga, until an invader causes commotion when he tries to kidnap Athena and the baby. Kouga is saved from certain death by the timely arrival of Gold Saint Seiya, who engages the mysterious invader, who reveals his identity as Mars. A new conflict begins as Seiya and Mars battle for the fate of Kouga, who years later, determined to live his life as he sees fit, challenges Athena.

titles.title: Sauvé par Seiya. La légende des Chevaliers renaît !
Seiya ga Sukutta Inochi! Yomigaere Saint Densetsu!
The Life that Seiya Saved! The Saint Legend, Revive!
星矢が救った命! 甦れ聖闘士[セイント]伝説!

REGULAR.description: Kouga is worried over the disappearance of Athena and frustrated for his failure to protect her and his mentor Shaina. Kouga is determined to master his Cosmo to rescue his goddess. Kouga departs to improve his mastery over Cosmo, later meeting Souma, the Lionet Bronze Saint, who teaches him about the elements of Cosmo. Eventually, Kouga and Souma are greeted by the challenge of Mantis Ordykia, one of Mars` henchmen, who puts their command over Cosmo to the test, an experience that strengthens their newfound friendship.

titles.title: Le départ. Une nouvelle génération de Chevaliers !
Setting Off on a Journey! Saints of the New Generation!
Tabidachi! Shin Sedai no Saint!
旅立ち! 新世代の聖闘士[セイント]!

REGULAR.description: Kouga arrives to the Palaestra, guided by Bear Geki and his disciple Souma. There he is greeted by Saint apprentices, who first approach him with hostility. Also, Kouga meets Aquila Yuna, the young female Saint, who teaches him about his constellation and about the code that guides Saint women.

titles.title: Kamen no Okite! Kaze no Saint Arawaru!
La loi du masque. Le chevalier qui maîtrisait le vent !
Law of the Mask! The Saint of the Wind Appears!
仮面の掟! 風の聖闘士[セイント]現わる!

REGULAR.description: Ryuuhou, the son of the legendary Bronze Saint Dragon Shiryuu, returns to the Palaestra after a short absence. The young Saint apprentices are subjected to a strict training to master their Cosmo element. Kouga is later forced to battle Ryuuhou in an intense element-to-element duel.

titles.title: Eiyuu no Musuko! Ryuuhou Tai Kouga!
Le fils d`un héros. Ryuho contre Koga !
The Son of a Hero! Ryuuhou Versus Kouga
英雄の息子! 龍峰対光牙!

REGULAR.description: The young Bronze Saints are taken by Bear Geki to the Hell Camp, which is full of lethal traps composed of the elements of Cosmo. Those who survive the Camp are elligible to become Silver Saints. Kouga and Souma must work together to overcome the obstacles, all while Souma must avoid fellow Saint Argo`s hostility and haunting memories of his past.

titles.title: Concours d`entrée. La course de l`enfer !
Selection Test! Challenge in The Camp of Death!
Senbatsu Shiken! Kesshi no Camp ni Idome!
選抜試験! 決死のキャンプに挑め!

REGULAR.description:
The fights are starting and the Saints are prepping, except for Koga.  His focus is only toward beating Orion Eden and winning the tournament.   His first opponent, Circinus Hook., gives Koga some prophetic advice
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kaimaku! Saint Fight!
Lever de rideau. Le tournoi peut commencer !
The Curtain Raises! The Saint Fight!
開幕! 聖闘士[セイント]ファイト!

REGULAR.description:
After a rough win, Koga has a renewed vigor to win the tournament, but his next opponent might be his toughest.  Yuna has her next match against the water element user, Delphinus Guney and the stage is set to his favor.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Les poings d`un ami. Les météores de Pégase !
The Fists of Friendship! Unleash the Pegasus Ryu Sei Ken!
Tomo no Kobushi! Ute, Pegasus Ryuusei Ken!
友の拳! 打て,ペガサス流星拳!

REGULAR.description:
Koga senses the arrival of a familiar Cosmo, Athena.  Rushing to meet her, he finds it is not Saori, but a scared girl asking for help.  The Headmaster appears and explains everything to Koga, then reveals he is Capricorn Ionia, a Gold Saint. 
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Fateful Meeting! The Unexpected Gold Saint!
Shukumei no Deai! Shougeki no Gold Saint!
Une rencontre prédestinée. Le terrible Chevalier d`or !
宿命の出会い! 衝撃の黄金聖闘士[ゴールドセイント]!

REGULAR.description:
Trapped in a cell beneath the school, Koga meets a forgotten Saint.  By working together they are able to break out of the jail cell, but the darkness has covered everything.  Will Koga be able to save his friends and who is the mysterious girl pretending to be Athena?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le sanctuaire menacé. Accours, Chevalier ninja !
Sanctuary no Kiki! Ninja Saint, Kakeru!
The Sanctuary in Danger! The Ninja Saint Arrives!
聖域[サンクチュアリ]の危機! 忍者聖闘士[セイント], 駆ける!

REGULAR.description:
After Koga and his friends escape from Palaestra, an impatient Koga decides to head straight to the Sanctuary to find Athena and rescue the mysterious girl.  Can 5 young warriors go head to head against a Gold Saint loyal to Mars?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kesshi no Dakkan! Mouhitori no Gold Saint!
Sauvetage périlleux. Encore un Chevalier d`or !
Suicidal Rescue! The Other Gold Saint!
決死の奪還! もう一人の黄金聖闘士[ゴールドセイント]!

REGULAR.description:
The Bonze Saints have been labeled traitors and have kidnapped Athena.  Mars sends his daughter and two Silver Saints to kill the traitors.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Aria o Mamore! Tsuisekisha Sonia no Shuugeki!
Protect Aria! The Attack of Sonia, the Pursuer!
Protéger Aria coûte que coûte. Sonia la tenace passe à l`attaque !
アリアを守れ! 追跡者ソニアの襲撃!

REGULAR.description:
The Silver Saint Hound Miguel has caught up to Koga , Aria, and Yuna.  Koga has told Yuna and Aria to continue while he lured Miguel away.   Can he really defeat a Silver Saint alone?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Inherited Cosmo! The Legendary Saint, Shun!
Uketsugareru Cosmo! Densetsu no Saint, Shun!
Un cosmos en héritage. Shun, le Chevalier légendaire !
受け継がれる小宇宙[コスモ]! 伝説の聖闘士[セイント], 瞬!

REGULAR.description:
The Saints have made it to the Wind Core guarded by Musca Fly.  When things look there worst, another friend makes his heroic return!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Message from Seiya! I Entrust Athena to You!
Le message de Seiya : Je vous confie Athéna !
Seiya no Message! Omaetachi ni, Athena o Takusu!
星矢のメッセージ! お前たちに, アテナを託す!

REGULAR.description:
A trip to Yuna’s homeland has brought back old memories that she has never shared with anyone.  And the next Saint sent to stop them is her old mentor.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kokyou de no Saikai! Setsugen no Shitei Taiketsu!
Retrouvailles en terre natale. L`élève affronte le maître !
Reunion at the Homeland! The Master and Disciple`s Duel in the Snowfields!
¡Reunión en mi ciudad natal! ¡Maestra y discípulo enfrentándose en los campos de nieve!
故郷での再会! 雪原の師弟対決!

REGULAR.description:
Hydra Ichi has caught up to the bronze saints after their battle at Yuna’s hometown.   He is there to help him but something doesn’t seem right.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Les crocs venimeux. Piège au deuxième vestige !
Semaru Dokuga! Inbou Uzumaku Daini no Iseki!
The Poisonous Fangs Approach! The Second Ruins Surrounded by Intrigue!
迫る毒牙! 陰謀うずまく第二の遺跡!

REGULAR.description:
The next core is beyond the ocean and the Saints have lost their money.  Are Saints allowed to have job?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: At the Star of Destiny`s Side! The Way of Living of a Saint!
L`étoile de la destinée. La voie des Chevaliers !
Unmei no Hoshi no Moto ni! Saint-tachi no Ikiru Michi!
運命の星のもとに! 聖闘士[セイント]達の生きる道!

REGULAR.description:
After finally making it across the ocean Koga and his team run into Raki, who has a special power and a unique job.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mamorubeki Mono! Cloth no Shuufukushi to Densetsu no Kouseki!
Protéger ce qui est précieux. Le réparateur d`armures !
We Must Protect Them! The Cloth Repairer and the Legendary Ore!
守るべきもの! 聖衣[クロス]の修復師と伝説の鉱石!

REGULAR.description:
A brief stop in Soma’s hometown is met with cheers and impromptu parties celebrating his arrival.  But when he meets the person responsible for his father’s death, a new side of Soma explodes.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fukushuu no Honoo! Souma, Innen no Tatakai!
La flamme de la vengeance. Soma : le combat d`une destinée !
The Flames of Vengeance! Souma`s Fated Battle!
復讐の炎! 蒼摩, 因縁の闘い!

REGULAR.description:
The team continues onward toward the water pillar where they meet up with Ryuho’s 
parents and the legendary Dragon Shiryu.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gorouhou no Himitsu! Keishou Seyo, Chichi, Shiryuu no Toushi!
Le secret du pic des cinq vieillards. Que la volonté de Shiryu soit transmise à son fils !
The Secret of the Rozan Five Peaks! Inherit the Fighting Spirit of Your Father Shiryu!
五老峰の秘密! 継承せよ, 父, 紫龍の闘志!

REGULAR.description:
With Sonia hurt, Eden has reached his tipping point and he will bring back Aria.  Can Koga and Yuna stop the son of Mars?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Aria no Tameni! Eden, Ikari no Raigeki!
For Aria`s Sake! Eden, the Thunder of Anger!
Pour Aria. Les foudres d`Eden !
アリアのために! エデン, 怒りの雷撃!

REGULAR.description:
Koga has a battle with a mysterious man inside a cave. Eden tries to understand why Aria left him and the world he is wants to build for her.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Pégase à terre. Un voyage pour reprendre courage !
The Flightless Pegasus! The Journey of Forfeit!
Tobenai Pegasus! Soushitsu kara no Tabidachi!
とべないペガサス! 喪失からの旅立ち!

REGULAR.description:
Haruto returns to his home of the Fuji-style Ninjas with Ryuho following.  After losing sight of Haruto, Ryuho is met with shurikens and kunai’s, it seems Saints are not welcomed.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ne jamais oublier son compagnon. La voie du ninja, la fierté du Chevalier !
Thoughts of a Friend! The Way of the Ninja and the Pride of a Saint!
Tomo e no Omoi! Shinobi no Michi to Saint no Kyouji!
友への思い! 忍びの道と聖闘士[セイント]の矜持!

REGULAR.description:
The saints come together to attack Mar’s castle in hopes of rescuing Aria.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Invading the Enemy! The Young Saints, Reunited!
Percée dans les rangs ennemis. Les jeunes Chevaliers à nouveau réunis !
Tekijin Totsunyuu! Wakaki Saint, Saishuuketsu!
敵陣突入! 若き聖闘士[セイント], 再集結!

REGULAR.description:
Shina-san has joined the team to help recover the Thunder Core, but first she must tell Koga and Aria of their true past.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Aiming for the Reunion! Let`s go to the Final Ruins!
Retrouvailles. Rendez-vous au dernier vestige !
Saikai o Mezashite! Ike, Saigo no Iseki e!
再会を目指して! 行け, 最後の遺跡へ!

REGULAR.description:
Ryuho, Haruto, and Yuna must face their regrets if they are to escape from darkness.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: En territoire inconnu. Le passé envahit le présent !
Michinaru Ryouiki! Meguriai no Toki!
Unknown Territory! The Moment of a Chance Meeting!
未知なる領域! めぐりあいの時!

REGULAR.description:
Sonia and Soma must face their past dealing with the death of Southern Cross Kazuma.  Eden, Koga, and Aria face a much more difficult trial.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Remembrance and Revenge! The Trap of the Darkness Ruins!
Souvenirs et vengeance. Le piège du vestige des ténèbres !
Tsuioku to Fukushuu! Yami no Iseki no Wana!
追憶と復讐! 闇の遺跡の罠!

REGULAR.description:
Eden, Aria, and Koga have fought through their nightmares and won. Mars is furious and has appeared  before the Saints to take what is his.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La fin du périple. La lumière de la jeune fille !
Tabi no Shuuen! Shoujo no Hikari to Wakamono-tachi!
The Journey`s End! The Girl`s Light and the Youths!
旅の終焉! 少女の光と若者たち!

REGULAR.description:
A look back on the rise of Mars and the fall of the Saints. 
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L`armée d’élite. Les Chevaliers d`or se rassemblent !
Saikyou no Gundan! Gold Saint Shuuketsu!
The Strongest Army! The Gathering of the Gold Saints!
最強の軍団! 黄金聖闘士[ゴールドセイント]集結!

REGULAR.description:
With the last of her strength, Aria saved her friends and sent them to an unexpected place.  While there they meet come across an unexpected Saint. 
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Arata na Tatakai no Makuake! Ougon Juunikyuu!
Start of a New Battle! The Golden House of Zodiac!
À l`aube d`une nouvelle bataille. Les douze maisons du zodiaque !
新たな闘いの幕開け! 黄金十二宮!

REGULAR.description:
Taurus Harbinger, a Gold Saint who enjoys only hearing the sounds of the opponents bones break.  With Koga down, his next 4 challengers will become a symphony of pain.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Des capacités phénoménales. Le Chevalier du taureau !
Incredible Power! Saint of the House of Taurus!
Kyoui no Jitsuryoku! Kingyuukyuu no Saint!
驚異の実力! 金牛宮の聖闘士!

REGULAR.description:
Ryuho has landed at the house of Gemini; he is escorted by a squirrel to a mysterious garden.  There he meets the Gold Saint, Paradox, that doesn’t want to fight, but just want love.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le choix fatidique. L`énigme de la maison des gémeaux !
Unmei no Bunkiten! Soujikyuu no Nazo!
Where Fate Diverges! Mystery of the House of Gemini!
運命の分岐点! 双児宮の謎!

REGULAR.description:
As Koga continues his fight against Taurus, Yuna must challenge Cancer Schiller who unique abilities will have her fight against those she cares for.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La terreur infinie. La macabre maison du cancer !
Makoto no Kyoufu! Kyokaikyuu ni Tadayou Youki!
True Fear! The Strange Aura Permeating the House of Cancer!
真[まこと]の恐怖! 巨蟹宮に漂う妖気!

REGULAR.description:
The secret to Paradox strength is revealed leaving Ryuho confused and Koga knocked out.  Paradox love is what keeping Ryuho alive for now…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Cosmo no Shinzui! Sebun Senshizu!
L`essence du cosmos. Le septième sens !
The Essence of Cosmo! The Seventh Sense!
小宇宙[コスモ]の真髄! セブンセンシズ!

REGULAR.description:
It`s the final battle in the House of Cancer as Yuna and Koga are sent to the gates of Hades by a Gold Saint. Badly wounded from their previous fights, will they be able to awaken to the Seventh Sense in time?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Border Between Life and Death! Battle in Hades!
Entre la vie et la mort. Combat au royaume des ombres !
Seishi no Hazama! Meikai no Tatakai!
生死の狭間! 冥界の闘い!

REGULAR.description:
Eden continues to mourn over Aria while Mars`s forces see this as a sign of weakness. Leo Mycenae steps in and says he will train Eden.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le poing du lion. Le chagrin d`Eden !
Shishi no Kobushi! Eden, Shoushin no Tatakai!
The Lion`s Fists! Eden`s Battle With His Wounded Heart!
獅子の拳! エデン, 傷心の闘い!

REGULAR.description:
Leo Mycenae thinks back to the time of Mars rise to power as he fights against two losing bronze.  Mycenae’s determination wavers as Eden comes to terms to what he must do.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kedakaki Pride! Mycenae, Ouja no Kobushi!
La loyauté avant tout. Mycène, le poing d`un roi !
Noble Pride! Mycenae, Fist of the King!
気高きプライド! ミケーネ, 王者の拳!

REGULAR.description:
The Saints are together again but they are pitted against a Gold Saint that can defeat them without the need of his cloth.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Steadfast Guardian! The Gold Saint of Virgo!
Un gardien inébranlable. Le Chevalier d`or de la vierge !
Yuruginaki Shugosha! Otomeza no Gold Saint!
揺るぎなき守護者! 乙女座の黄金聖闘士[ゴールドセイント]!

REGULAR.description:
As Eden steps in to fight Virgo Fudo the other Saints take this opportunity to continue ahead to next battle against a Saint that Haruto has history with.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Une rébellion courageuse. La décision d`Eden !
Valiant Rebellion! Eden Decides to Fight!
Yuukan naru Hangyaku! Eden, Ketsui no Toushi!
勇敢なる反逆! エデン,決意の闘志!

REGULAR.description:
A battle between Gold Saints is said to be a battle of a thousand days, a fight that always 
end in a stalemate!  The fight between Aquarius and Libra Genbu will rock the young Saints to their very core.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Retrouvailles à la maison de la Balance. Chevalier d`or contre Chevalier d`or !
Reunion at the House of Libra! A Battle of Gold Versus Gold!
Tenbinkyuu no Saikai! Gekitotsu, Gold tai Gold!
天秤宮の再会! 激突, 黄金対黄金!

REGULAR.description:
Sonia has been given a Gold Cloth to fulfill her duty to Mars; Soma intendeds to fight her one on one to end things once and for all.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La détermination de Sonia. Rompre les chaînes du destin !
Sonia no Kakugo! Innen no Rensa o Tate!
Sonia`s Resolve! Break the Cycle of Fate!
ソニアの覚悟! 因縁の連鎖を断て!

REGULAR.description:
Tokisada’s cosmo has been heightened thanks to the being at the end of time.  Haruto and Ryuho don’t stand a chance against a powered up Tokisada.  
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L`ambition de Tokisada. Le conquérant de la fin des temps !
Tokisada no Yabou! Jikan no Hate no Hasha!
Tokisada`s Ambition! The Ruler of the End of Time!
時貞の野望! 時間の果ての覇者!

REGULAR.description:
Ionia fights for his love of Athena and Koga fights for Saori.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le chevalier d`or félon. Ionia contre Koga !
The Traitorous Gold Saint! Ionia Versus Koga!
Uragiri no Gold Saint! Ionia Tai Kouga!
裏切りの黄金聖闘士[ゴールドセイント]! イオニア対光牙!

REGULAR.description:
Koga is given a choice; remain in the light and watch his friends die or accept the darkness.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gunshin Fukkatsu! Totsunyuu, Saigo no Kyuu!
La résurrection des seigneurs de guerre. À l`assaut de la dernière maison !
The War Gods Revive! Attack the Final House!
軍神復活! 突入, 最後の宮!

REGULAR.description:
Now that Koga has given himself to the dark side, will his friends be able to stop him and the Four Kings of Mars? 
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: For My Friends! Koga`s Hidden Power!
Nakama no Tame ni! Kouga ni Himerareshi Chikara!
Pour mes compagnons ! La force cachée de Koga !
仲間のために! 光牙に秘められし力!

REGULAR.description:
Koga finally confronts Mars and before their battle reaches the peak, Eden steps in and Mars tell him how he became the war god.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Araburu Gunshin! Mars to Ludwig!
La fureur du dieu de la guerre ! Mars et Ludwig !
The War God Rages! Mars and Ludwig!
荒ぶる軍神! マルスとルードヴィグ!

REGULAR.description:
Can Eden and Koga defeat the God of War, Mars whose power has surpassed Athena’s?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Koga and Eden! Destroy the Darkness, Young Cosmo!
Koga et Eden ! Jeunes chevaliers, enflammez votre cosmos contre les ténèbres !
Kouga to Eden! Wakaki Cosmos yo Yami o Ute!
光牙とエデン! 若き小宇宙[コスモ]よ闇を討て!

REGULAR.description:
With Mars gone, Medea’s final plan can finally start as her brother comes to finish off Koga and Eden.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Small Hope! Land Where a New Battle Starts!
L`infime espoir ! Un nouveau champ de bataille !
Wazuka na Kibou! Aratanaru Tatakai no Chi!
わずかな希望! 新たなる闘いの地!

REGULAR.description:
Betrayed by his Sister, Amor tries to kill Koga but the seed planted before has sprouted and true darkness has arisen. 
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Compagnons, rassemblez-vous ! L`incroyable cosmos de Koga !
Gather, My Friends! Koga`s Overflowing Cosmo!
Tomo yo Tsudoe! Kouga no Minagiru Cosmo!
友よ集え! 光牙のみなぎる小宇宙[コスモ]!

REGULAR.description:
Abzu has taken complete control, and things look bad for the Bronze Saints.  But a chance of salvation might happen, but it is up to Eden.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le maître des ténèbres ! Apsu le terrifiant !
The Ruler of Darkness! The Terror Abzu!
Yami no Shihaisha! Abzu no Kyoufu!
闇の支配者! アプスの恐怖!

REGULAR.description:
A former Saint comes to help the team in their darkness moment. 
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le vœu des jeunes Chevaliers ! Entends leur souhait, Seiya !
Reach Seiya! The Young Saints` Wish!
Seiya ni Todoke! Wakaki Saint-tachi no Negai!
星矢に届け! 若き聖闘士達の願い!

REGULAR.description:
Koga calls on his friends to burn their Cosmo!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Brille Koga ! L`ultime bataille entre la lumière et les ténèbres !
Kagayake Kouga! Hikari to Yami to Saishuu Kessen!
Shine, Koga! The Final Battle Between Light and Darkness!
輝け光牙! 光と闇の最終決戦!

REGULAR.description:
A young man has come to challenge Koga, but an older, wiser Koga doesn’t respond to his provocations.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A New Cloth! Fly, New Pegasus!
Arata na Cloth! Tobe, New Pegasus!
Une nouvelle armure ! Reprends ton envol Pegase !
新たな聖衣[クロス]! 翔べ, 新生[ニュー]ペガサス!

REGULAR.description:
Koga has travelled to the coliseum to speak with Athena about the rise of the Pallasites.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Reunited! Soma, Ignite Your Soul`s Flames!
Saikai! Souma yo, Tamashii no Honoo o Moyase!
再会! 蒼摩よ, 魂の炎を燃やせ!

REGULAR.description:
Koga and Soma were not the only ones in need of visiting Aries Kiki, the world’s only Cloth repairer.  Aquila Yuna has traveled to have her Cloth repaired because of the upcoming danger she has read in the stars.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Courage Gives Me Power! Let My Cloth Be Reborn!
Yuuki o Chikara ni! Cloth yo, Umarekaware!
勇気を力に! 聖衣[クロス]よ, 生まれ変われ!

REGULAR.description:
With is battles over, Ryuho wants to live simple life with his parents, but his father continues to push and train him.  Will Ryuho find meaning in his father’s reluctant training or give up the Dragon cloth completely.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kakegae no Nai Mono! Mezameyo, Dragon!
That Which Is Most Dear! Awaken, Dragon!
かけがえのないもの! 目覚めよ, 龍[ドラゴン]!

REGULAR.description:
Koga travels next to recruit Haruto against the rising Pallasites.  But the Wolf Haurto life has turned an unexpected direction and he is not quick to give it up.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kokoro ni Hibike! Haruto no Shout!
Resonate in the Heart! Haruto`s Shout!
心に響け! 栄斗のシャウト!

REGULAR.description:
The promise of reviving those he lost and loved has convinced Eden to join Pallasite.  Can Eden the son of
Mars do what everyone else has failed and kill Koga?  
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Defeat Pegasus! Eden, the Solitary Soldier!
Pegasus o Taose! Kokou no Senshi Eden!
ペガサスを倒せ! 孤高の戦士エデン!

REGULAR.description:
Athena has summoned all the Saints for an important announcement as the four kings appear in front of Pallas to grant her every wish.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shitennou Arawaru! Athena Tai Pallas Zenmen Taiketsu!
The Four Kings Appear! Full-Scale War between Athena and Pallas!
四天王現わる! アテナ対パラス全面対決!

REGULAR.description:
As the Pallasites continue to attack small villages, the legendary Andromeda Shun joins the battle but must deal with his past involving Ray
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kyoudai no Kizuna! Andromeda Shun, Sansen!
The Bonds Between Brothers! Andromeda Shun Joins the Fight!
兄弟の絆! アンドロメダ瞬, 参戦!

REGULAR.description:
Koga is visiting a Steel Saint training facility and meets the former Wolf Bronze Saint and Lionet.  He gets this chance to learn more about the Steel Saint and Subaru mysterious background.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Steel Star! Subaru, Embrace Your Steel Will!
Steel no Hoshi! Subaru yo, Hagane no Toushi o Idake!
鋼鉄[スチール]の星! 昴よ, 鋼の闘志を抱け!

REGULAR.description:
The Saints gather at the Palaestra as former Saints reunite with their current counterparts. Libra Genbu the Palaestra’s commander has harsh words for Kogo and his friends.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Vast Army Approaches! The Battle to Defend the Palaestra!
Semaru Daigunzei! Palaestra Boueisen!
迫る大軍勢! パライストラ防衛戦!

REGULAR.description:
Genbu defeats Aegir and stops him from entering the Palaestra.  But Aegir gets the Holy Blade Cataclysm Slash frmo Hyperion and rises to fight again.  Genbu is blown away by its destructive Cosmo.  And then Aegir uses it to cut apart the time of the people in the Palaestra.  To take back their time, Genbu draws the Libra Sword and challenges Aegir.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Genbu no Shitou! Seiken Tai Libra no Ken!
Genbu`s Duel! Holy Blade vs. the Libra Blade!
玄武の死闘! 聖剣対天秤[ライブラ]の剣!

REGULAR.description:
Genbu lost his life defending the Palaestra.  His death has many effects on the people around him.  Koga and his friends resolve to fight the Pallasites, but many saints have lost the will to fight.  Hati sees this as the ideal time to attack the Palaestra and leads his troops. Koga and his friends rally to fight them, but then a golden light appears!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Seiya Sets Out! Athena`s Resolve!
Seiya, Shutsujin! Athena no Ketsui!
星矢, 出陣! アテナの決意!

REGULAR.description:
Saori risks her life to find Pallas`s hiding place.  Koga and his friends go to Pallasvelda, where the Pallasites have their base.  They are stopped at a bridge by the Class 3 Pallasite Cyllene.  He tries to destroy the bridge, but Haruto appears and saves them.  But Subaru recklessly rungs back and is knocked into the chasm below.  Subaru is saved by Haruto, but Cyllene and another shadow attack!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Go Forward, Saints! The Steep Path to Pallasvelda!
Susume Saint! Pallasvelda e no Kewashiki Michi!
進め聖闘士[セイント]! パラスベルダへの険しき道!

REGULAR.description:
The Saints bust down the gate and enter the city of Pallasvelda.  The Saints try to find the way to the castle.  Seiya picks the path with the most Pallasites so he can be a decoy.  Koga and his friends go the other way and are met by Tarvos.  Tarvos is in his heavy armor, and seeing his power Koga sends the others ahead and fights alone.  The battle between Koga and Tarvos begins, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Break the Iron Gate! Halberd of Pegasus and Shield of the Dragon!
Yabure Teppeki no Mon! Pegasus no Hoko to Dragon no Tate!
破れ鉄壁の門! 天馬[ペガサス]の矛と龍[ドラゴン]の盾!

REGULAR.description:
The battle between the Saints and Pallasites continues in Pallasvelda.  Many Steel Saints are there as well.  Two of these Steel Saints, Kerry and Ema, are saved from near-certain death by Soma and Subaru.  But this makes Ema question why she`s there at all.  As she wonders if the Steel Saints aren`t just slowing the others down, Loge and his Pallasite Bees appear!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Steel Funtou! Namonaki Yuusha-tachi!
The Steel Struggle! The Nameless Heroes!
鋼鉄[スチール]奮闘! 名もなき勇者たち!

REGULAR.description:
The Titans send the class-2 Pallasite Europa to stop the advancing Koga. On his way, Europa encounters Eden, who has been led to the battlefield by a mysterious power.  Seiya appears between them, and fearing the power of the gold saint, Europa flees.  Seiya tells a doubting Eden to find his own answer to why he fights.  And then Europa attacks Koga hoping to defeat the remaining bronzes!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Subaru, Kyoui no Cosmo! Eden no Shimei!
Subaru`s Terrifying Cosmo! Eden`s Task!
昴, 驚異の小宇宙[コスモ]! エデンの使命!

REGULAR.description:
Pallas gets tired of waiting and sneaks out of the castle to the town where the Saints and Pallasites are fighting.  Koga meets her as she plays in town by chance, and thinks she`s a normal person.  He saves her from the Pallasites attacks, and she takes a liking to him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Koga and Pallas! Meeting on the Battlefield!
Kouga to Pallas! Senjou no Deai!
光牙とパラス! 戦場の出会い!

REGULAR.description:
Soma and Yuna arrive at a heavily defended Pallasite gate.  Yuna insists it`s a shortcut to Pallas`s castle, but Ymir and Metone, two twin Pallasites burning with vengeance, block their path.  Soma and Yuna prepare to fight, but Metone makes an unexpected move.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Honoo no Arashi o Okose! Yuna to Souma no Yuujou!
Make a Storm of Fire! The Friendship of Yuna and Soma!
炎の嵐を起こせ! ユナと蒼摩の友情!

REGULAR.description:
As Koga and friends advance through Pallasvelda they are confronted by a single Pallasite.  His name is Miller.  
He has no rank and no Chronotector, but a powerful gauntlet on his arm.  His strength is amazing and he defeats Subaru in a single hit.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Cloth no Hakaisha! Hagure Pallasite Raishuu!
The Cloth Destroyer! Attack of the Rogue Pallasite!
聖衣[クロス]の破壊者! はぐれパラサイト来襲!

REGULAR.description:
Koga and friends save a young girl named Selene from the Pallasites, and meet Equuleus Celeris.  Celeris leads them to an underground base where people are still moving, but on the way Subaru learns that the Equuleus cloth is called the cursed cloth.  It gives its wearer great power, but they are destined to die in battle.  Meanwhile, Titan sends Thebe and Hati to stop the Saints from getting any closer to Pallas`s castle!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Norowareta Cloth!? Equuleus no Saint!
The Cursed Cloth!? The Equuleus Saint!
呪われた聖衣[クロス]!? 小馬座[エクレウス]の聖闘士[セイント]!

REGULAR.description:
The party advances along the route to Pallas`s castle, but Celeris stays behind to protect the people.  But Hati attacks to get his revenge on Celeris once he sees Koga is gone.  Subaru comes back, though, and Celeris tells him the story of how he got the Equuleus cloth.  It was a story of the last Equuleus Saint, Kitalpha, who saved him when he was still a normal person.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Cloth, Keishou! Equuleus no Subaru, Tanjou!
The Cloth Is Passed On! Equuleus Subaru Is Born!
聖衣[クロス], 継承! 小馬座[エクレウス]の昴, 誕生!

REGULAR.description:
The underground passage to the castle is destroyed by the Pallasites, and the group is forced to go above ground once more.  As the fierce battle between Saints and Pallasites continues, Koga senses a familiar cosmo and turns back.  It is Raki, who has come at Kiki`s orders.  Koga and Subaru save her from Halimede at the last second.  But Subaru is upset that the Equuleus Cloth isn`t doing what he wants.  Meanwhile at the Sanctuary, Saori goes to a massive statue of Athena to prepare for the final battle.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Equuleus no Namida!? Kakusei Suru Futatsu no Cloth!
The Tears of Equuleus?! Two Cloths Awaken!
小馬座[エクレウス]の涙!?覚醒する二つの聖衣[クロス]!

REGULAR.description:
The Saints make a forward base inside Pallasvelda.  The wounded warriors gather there to heal.  Kiki repairs their cloths, and Raki leads Koga`s group there. Shaina and Geki and other old faces are there too.  But Dione comes to avenge his loss against Kiki, and attacks.  Shaina and the others fight him off while Kiki is busy repairing their cloths.  And then their reinforcements arrive!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kiki no Tatakai! Sedai o Koeta Nakama!
Kiki`s Battle! Comrades Across Generations!
貴鬼の闘い! 世代を越えた仲間!

REGULAR.description:
As the battle against the Pallasites continues, Paradox is rescued from the Cape Sounion prison by Gallia, one of the Four Pallasite Kings.  Meanwhile in Pallasvelda, with their cloths repaired by Kiki, Koga and the others are heading back to the front lines.  Then Ryuho is cut off and trapped in a mysterious space.  He is attacked by Paradox, who is now a Class 2 Pallasite and wearing a chronotector.  She tries to get revenge on Ryuho, but a surprising figure stops her!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Destined Encounter! Gemini Returns!
Sadame no Kaikou! Gemini, Futatabi!
定めの邂逅! 双子座[ジェミニ],再び!

REGULAR.description:
Koga and friends arrive at Pallas`s castle, but again they are met by Mira.  They are surrounded by flames and have nowhere to run, and begin to lose the battle.  But a man appears who walks through the flames as if they were nothing. The man`s name is Phoenix Ikki.  Koga welcomes him, but Ikki calls him weak and angrily hits him.  Mira is interested in Ikki`s desire to fight alone, and attempts to destroy his cloth!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fushichou! Phoenix no Ikki, Kenzan!
The Immortal Bird! Phoenix Ikki Appears!
不死鳥! 鳳凰座[フェニックス]の一輝, 見参!

REGULAR.description:
The "Gate of Time" is the final and greatest barrier to Pallas`s castle.  Titan, one of the Four Kings, has stopped time around the gate, and no attack will hurt it.  Koga tries to open the gate, and the other bronzes fight off the Pallasites` best troops to open a path for him.  With their help, he reaches the gate.  Will he be able to open it, and secure the way into Pallas`s castle?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Hour Has Come! The Saints of Athena Gather!
Toki yo Ugoke! Tsudoishi Athena no Saint!
刻よ動け! 集いしアテナの聖闘士[セイント]!

REGULAR.description:
Athena`s armies destroy the Gate of Time and secure the way into Pallas`s castle.  As they try to find their way through its labyrinth, Ikki and Integra go ahead.  Shaina leads the forces protecting them from teh rear, and Koga and the rest go inside.  Europa appears, and tells them there are four paths which may lead them to Pallas.  They are forced to choose between four paths: Alfheim, Niflheim, Dvergar, and Vanaheim.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kessen no Hajimari! Shukumei no Megami no Moto e!
Start of the Final Battle! To the Goddess of Destiny!
決戦の始まり! 宿命の女神のもとへ!

REGULAR.description:
A new Pallasite blocks Koga, Soma, and Yuna as they head into the castle.  It is Surtr, wielder of the Mystic Stone, who has come at Aegaeon`s orders.  They try to break past him, but his ultimate barrier, "Cosmo Reflect", blocks all their attacks.  But Shun comes to save them.  Will his Nebula chain be able to break the ultimate barrier?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: An Assassin Master of Offense and Defense! Shun`s Secret Chain Plan!
Kouhou Ippai no Shikaku! Shun, Hisaku no Chain!
攻防一体の刺客! 瞬, 秘策の鎖[チェーン]!

REGULAR.description:
Subaru, Haruto, and Eden let Hyouga handle the Pallasite soldiers and go on ahead.  But Haruto sees a cosmo he remembers, and they find themselves in a strange room lined with clocks.  There they find Tokisada, who is now a class-2 Pallasite.  He is burning with a desire for revenge against Haruto, and uses the power of his Chronotector to stop his own time so that no attacks can hurt him.  Eden realizes that they have a chance to attack the second he releases his time stop!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The King of Time! Hyoga`s Powers of Absolute Zero!
Toki no Ou! Hyouga, Zettai Reido no Kooki!
時の王! 氷河, 絶対零度の凍気!

REGULAR.description:
Koga and his friends at last meet with one of the four Pallasites.  His name is Aegaeon, of the Heavy Lightning Strike.  They attack him, but his holy sword controls gravity and slams them into the ground before they get close.  To protect them, Shun uses his chains.  But the Gravitontector, the ultimate Chronotector, makes Aegaeon immune even to Shun`s attacks!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chronotector Equipped! The Impact of the Four Kings!
Chronotector Souchaku! Shitennou no Shougeki!
¡Cronotech colocada! ¡El impacto de los cuatro grandes Palasianos!
刻衣[クロノテクター]装着! 四天王の衝撃!

REGULAR.description:
Ikki appears to save Shun from Aegaeon`s Heavy Lightning Striker.  He decides to fight Aegaeon alone, and sends Kouga along to Pallas.  A deadly battle between Ikki and Aegaeon begins as their cosmo collides.  Ikki repels the gravity of the Heavy Lighting Striker, but Aegaeon uses his ultimate lightning.  It destroys the Phoenix Cloth, and at last Ikki falls to the ground!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Ultimate Fighting Spirit! Ikki vs. Aegaeon!
Toushi no Kiwami! Ikki Tai Aegaeon!
闘志の極み! 一輝対アイガイオン!

REGULAR.description:
Ikki dies in a huge explosion, taking Aigaeon with him.  The saints cry at his death.  With one of the four kings down, Titan orders Class-2 Pallasite Rhea to kill Shiryuu and Ryuho with the divine spear Gae Bolg, which can peirce anything.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shiryu and Ryuho! The Souls of Goroho!
Shiryuu to Ryuuhou! Gorouhou no Tamashii!
紫龍と龍峰! 五老峰の魂!

REGULAR.description:
The Saints travel through four paths in the castle seeking Pallas.  But 3 of them are endless loops without exists.  Saori and the other Gold Saints have been lured into the one proper path, and are stopped by Paradox.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Shadow Approaches! The Gold Saints That Protect Athena!
Semaru Kage! Athena Mamorishi Gold Saint!
迫る影! アテナ守りし黄金聖闘士[ゴールドセイント]!

REGULAR.description:
Galia, one of the four kings, appears in the middle of the battle between Paradox and Integra.  With her Holy Blade, "War God`s Manifestation", she deals a fatal blow to Paradox.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Struggle Against Fate! A Declaration of Rebellion!
Unmei ni Aragae! Hangyaku no Kokuhaku!
運命に抗え! 反逆の告白!

REGULAR.description:
The Bronze Saints escape the labyrinth and reach the battlefield where Galia and the golds are fighting.  Galia leads them to a new battleground where she attempts to wipe out the Saints, but the bronzes say that they will fight her alone and send the golds on ahead.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Cloth no Himitsu! Hatsudou Suru Arata na Chikara!
Secret of the Cloth! A New Power Awakens!
聖衣[クロス]の秘密! 発動する新たな力!

REGULAR.description:
Hyperion, one of the four kings, goes to kill the golds.  With his Cataclysm Slash, he overwhelms them.  The Cataclysm Slash has the power to destroy the protons that make up atoms.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gold Danketsu! Kinjirareta Ougi!
The Golds Unite! The Forbidden Technique!
黄金[ゴールド]団結! 禁じられた奥義!

REGULAR.description:
The Bronze Saints feel a huge cosmo explosion and run to the source.  They find the horrible damage caused by the Athena Exclamation.  The bronzes are struck silent by actions of the Gold Saints.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nokosareta Ishi! Ooinaru Saint no Oshie!
The Will That Is Left Behind! The Great Teachings of the Saints!
残された意志! 大いなる聖闘士[セイント]の教え!

REGULAR.description:
Hyperion`s Chrono Catastrophe has stopped Subaru`s time.  The bronzes rise to battle Hyperion and restore Subaru.  And inside his mind, Subaru meets a mysterious man.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Awaken! The Ultimate Omega!
Mezamero! Kyuukyoku no Omega!
目覚めろ! 究極のΩ!

REGULAR.description:
Saori and the Golds finally reach Pallas`s throne room.  The last of the Four Kings, Titan, is waiting for them.  Harbinger launches a sudden attack on Pallas, but Titan blocks him and blows him away.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Raging Taurus! Reach the Throne Room of Pallas!
Taurus Tosshin! Toutatsu, Pallas no Ma!
牡牛[タウラス]突進! 到達, パラスの間!

REGULAR.description:
At last the time has come for Saori and Pallas to fight.  Seiya tries to intervene but Saori makes him stand down.  In the age of myths, Pallas tried to destroy humanity because she wanted Athena`s love all to herself.  To protect the Earth, Athena was forced to defeat her.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Athena and Pallas! Final Battle Between the Goddesses!
Athena to Pallas! Megami no Kessen!
アテナとパラス! 女神の決戦!

REGULAR.description:
In his New Gold Cloth, Seiya battles Titan!  The two fight for the goddesses they believe in.  In the midst of the battle, Seiya tells something to Titan, and when he hears it, Titan laughs.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Seiya no Honshin! Itsuwari kara no Kikan!
Seiya`s True Feelings! Return from the Lies!
星矢の本心! 偽りからの帰還!

REGULAR.description:
The god of time, Saturn, who had been sleeping inside Subaru, awakens.  The saints try desperately to reach a transformed Subaru, but to no avail.  He puts on his Chronotector and draws his sword to fight them.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The God of Time! Saturn Arrives!
Toki no Kami! Saturn Kourin!
刻の神! サターン降臨!

REGULAR.description:
Koga and the other saints fly through the sky after Saturn.  Meanwhile, Saturn`s personal guard appears on Earth.  The Steel Saints fight valiantly to stop them, but Aegir appears again, with his weapon enhanced by a fragment of the Cataclysm Slash.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kibou no Toushi! Saint no Kizuna!
Warriors of Hope! The Bonds of the Saints!
希望の闘士! 聖闘士[セイント]の絆!

REGULAR.description:
Europa and Mira attack, trying to finish off Athena and Pallas.  Hyouga and Shun try to stop them, but are unable to withstand their full power. Meanwhile, Koga gets to Saturn and challenges him, but he and his friends are overwhelmed by the god`s power.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kami o Koero! Seiya no Cosmo!
Surpass a God! Seiya`s Cosmo!
神を超えろ! 星矢の小宇宙[コスモ]!

REGULAR.description:
Seiya appears to have ended the battle with the golden dagger, but Saturn stops him at the last second.  He attacks an exhausted Seiya mercilessly.  Koga and the others fight Saturn, but Saturn has defeated the power of Omega and defeats them one by one.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Saigo no Tatakai! Yuke, Omega no Saint!
The Last Battle! Go, Saints of Omega!
最後の闘い! ゆけ, Ωの聖闘士[セイント]!

REGULAR.description:
With the aid of everyoen`s cosmo, Pegasus`s omega cloth evolves even further.  Koga challenges Saturn again, and Saturn is shocked at his strength.  During the battle, Saturn feels a strange excitement.  It is a passion he`s never felt in his long years as a god!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tatakai no Hate! Kouga Yo, Densetsu to Nare!
The End of the Battle! Koga, Become a Legend!
闘いの果て! 光牙よ, 伝説となれ!
Opening 1
Opening 2
Opening 3
セイントセイヤオメガ
Saint Seiya Omega
Saint Seiya Omega
Saint Seiya Omega
圣斗士星矢Ω
聖闘士星矢Ω
sso
